original_text: But in mine adversity they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together: yea, the abjects gathered themselves together against me, and I knew it not; they did tear me, and ceased not:
korean_text: 그러나 내가 넘어지매 그들이 기뻐하여 서로 모임이여 불량배가 내가 알지 못하는 중에 모여서 나를 치며 찢기를 마지아니하도다

sentences.original_text: But in mine adversity they rejoiced
yea, the abjects gathered themselves together against me
sentences.korean_translation: 과연 비천한 자들이 나를 대적하여 스스로 모였으며
